0.title: Moment of Science - What Is Applied Geekdom?

episode of.title: Doctor Geek's Laboratory of Applied Geekdom (TV Series 2015â€“ )

0.plot: Doctor Geek and DEUS-X show little Virginia what it means to apply your geekdom.

imdb.plot outline: It's the 21st Century. Ever wondered what happened to all those inventions, conveniences, and other concepts the future was suppose to bring? Well, so have we. Doctor Geek and his lab staff explore all the realms of applied geekdom. They will examine the future that was, the future that is, and the future that has not yet come to pass. Doctor Geek established the lab and his science fair as STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Math) outreach. Through enthusiasm, passion, and humor, the lab brings audiences closer to the scientists, inventors, entrepreneurs, tinkerers, and others who are attempting to bring about the world of tomorrow while poking fun at some of our favorite Sci-Fi tropes and shows.
imdb.title: Doctor Geek's Laboratory of Applied Geekdom
akas: Doctor Geek's Laboratory of Applied Geekdom (United States)
plot: Doctor Geek and his mad-cap band of lab assistants look to teach the world how to apply their geekdom.

It's the 21st Century. Ever wondered what happened to all those inventions, conveniences, and other concepts the future was suppose to bring? Well, so have we. Doctor Geek and his lab staff explore all the realms of applied geekdom. They will examine the future that was, the future that is, and the future that has not yet come to pass. Doctor Geek established the lab and his science fair as STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Math) outreach. Through enthusiasm, passion, and humor, the lab brings audiences closer to the scientists, inventors, entrepreneurs, tinkerers, and others who are attempting to bring about the world of tomorrow while poking fun at some of our favorite Sci-Fi tropes and shows.::Scott Viguie and J.C. De La Torre
